name: No Rest for the Wicked
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Trigger (Automatic) You are unconscious.
Requirements You do not have the dying condition.
-
Aposyntheto uses his own vitality to wake you the fuck up.  
Effect Aposyntheto loses 1d6 Shard Points plus an additional 1d6 Shard Points equal to your Wounded value, making you no longer unconscious.
